patthana15.89:4.1: Saraṇaṃ ajjhattārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.89:4.2: Araṇaṃ ajjhattārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.89:4.3: Hetuyā dve, aññamaññe ekaṃ … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate dve.
patthana15.89:5.1: Saraṇaṃ bahiddhārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nabahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.89:5.2: Araṇaṃ bahiddhārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nabahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.89:5.3: Hetuyā dve, aññamaññe ekaṃ … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate dve.
